team3.src.client
Class AbstractClient.AbstractClientThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      team3.src.client.AbstractClient.AbstractClientThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Client.ClientThread
Enclosing class:
AbstractClient
protected abstract static class AbstractClient.AbstractClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Abstraction of a client thread. This class will do the communication between the AbstractClient and the Abstract Server.

Author:
Joir-dan Gumbs
